export default function AttendanceCard() { const subjects = [ { name: "Data Structures", percentage: 85, attended: 34, total: 40, nextClass: "Tomorrow 10 AM" }, { name: "Operating Systems", percentage: 72, attended: 25, total: 35, nextClass: "Today 2 PM" } ]; return (

Attendance Overview

{subjects.map((subject, index) => (

{subject.name}

{subject.percentage}% {subject.attended}/{subject.total} classes
Next: {subject.nextClass}
= 75 ? 'bg-green-500' : 'bg-yellow-500' }`} style={{ width: `${subject.percentage}%` }} />
))}
41 Days All Says: Safe to bunk!

You can miss 1-2 classes and still maintain 75%

); }
